item.title: How to Grow Purslane From Cuttings
item.dc:creator: Neil Mahaseth
item.description:
Hi, plant lovers learn about purslane a nutrient powerhouse, the richest know plant source of omega 3 fatty acid. We will show you how easy it is to grow this...

The post How to Grow Purslane From Cuttings appeared first on Plants My Love.
item.content:encoded:
Hi, plant lovers learn about purslane a nutrient powerhouse, the richest know plant source of omega 3 fatty acid. We will show you how easy it is to grow this plant in harsh arid climates from cuttings.

▼Scan @ Video Index▼

  • 00:00 Intro
  • 00:48 Purslane Plant Information
  • 3:47 Type and Length of Purslane Cuttings
  • 4:20 Growing Container and Cutting Placement
  • 5:45 Sunlight, Temperature, and Time Required
  • 5:21 Cutting Update after 8 Days
  • 6:45 Cutting Transplant in Bigger Container
  • 8:15 Purslane Growth after 40 Days

I hope friends, you liked this video guide on How to Grow Purslane from Cutting. If yes, don’t forget to share this video with your friends and family whom you think could benefit from it. If you liked this, you might also like our other gardening-related content. Make sure to subscribe to our YouTube channel or join our mailing list to be alerted as soon as a new video is released. Thanks for watching friends see you later bye.

item.content:encoded:
